item.title: Game Boy CPU basics
item.description: Writing assembly code for the Game Boy isn’t as hard as it first may seem. Here are some basic things that you need to know before getting stuck into it.

item.title: Things to know before starting Game Boy development
item.description: Interested in Game Boy development but want to get a bit of an idea what’s involved first? Here’s a quick list of things I think are useful to know.
